languages.text: "Доверюсь совету Соломона — если кардинал хочет оспорить свое возведение в статус святого, пусть отправляется на Терру".
languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_CardinalFlagelliant
Дать Даргонусу без+
Оставляем кардинала в живых — он улетает из системы
Весы налево

Запускается этюд VP_CardinalFlagelliant
Дать Даргонусу без+
Оставляем кардинала в живых — он улетает из системы
Весы налево

languages.text: "I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."
languages.original_text: "Доверюсь совету Соломона — если кардинал хочет оспорить свое возведение в статус святого, пусть отправляется на Терру".

traits.locale_text: "I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his sainthood, he should go to Terra."
"I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his sainthood, he should go to Terra."
"I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."
"I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."
"I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."
"I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."

languages.text: "Ich werde Solomornes Rat vertrauen. Wenn der Kardinal gegen seine Heiligsprechung Einspruch erheben will, soll er nach Terra fliegen."
languages.original_text: "I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Solomornes Rat vertrauen. Wenn der Kardinal gegen seine Heiligsprechung Einspruch erheben will, soll er nach Terra fliegen."

languages.text: « Je m'en remets au jugement de Solomorne. Si le cardinal tient à contester sa sainteté supposée, c'est sur Terra qu'il lui faut se rendre. »
languages.original_text: "I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'en remets au jugement de Solomorne. Si le cardinal tient à contester sa sainteté supposée, c'est sur Terra qu'il lui faut se rendre. »

languages.text: “我愿意相信索罗蒙的提议。如果主教大人打算质疑自己的圣人身份，那他应该亲自前往神圣泰拉。”
languages.original_text: "I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意相信索罗蒙的提议。如果主教大人打算质疑自己的圣人身份，那他应该亲自前往神圣泰拉。”

languages.text: «Confiaré en el consejo de Solomorne. Si el cardenal quiere oponerse a la propuesta de santidad, debe hacerlo en Terra».
languages.original_text: "I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."

traits.locale_text: «Confiaré en el consejo de Solomorne. Si el cardenal quiere oponerse a la propuesta de santidad, debe hacerlo en Terra».

languages.text: 「ソロモーンの助言を信頼することにする。枢機卿が自身に提案された列聖のことで異議を唱えたいのなら、地球へ行くべきだ」
languages.original_text: "I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーンの助言を信頼することにする。枢機卿が自身に提案された列聖のことで異議を唱えたいのなら、地球へ行くべきだ」

languages.text: "Solomorne'un dediğini uygun buldum. Kardinal, azizliğini sınamak istiyorsa Terra'ya gitsin."
languages.original_text: "I will put my trust in Solomorne's advice. If the cardinal wants to challenge his proposed sainthood, he should go to Terra."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne'un dediğini uygun buldum. Kardinal, azizliğini sınamak istiyorsa Terra'ya gitsin."
